import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useParams, Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaFolder, FaUser, FaArrowLeft,FaEye } from 'react-icons/fa'; import '../css/UserDetail.css'; const UserDetail = () => { const { userId } = useParams(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [user, setUser] = useState(null); const [albums, setAlbums] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch(`https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users/${userId}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(setUser); fetch(`https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/albums?userId=${userId}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(setAlbums); }, [userId]); if (!user) return
